data.name: Appointment Availability by District
data.description: Auto Triggered every 1 hour to get vaccine availabilty by District for 7 days

input.message: =utility.renderJSON($activity[FilterSessions].output,boolean.false())

input.subject: =string.concat("Vaccine Availability for District ID - ", $flow.queryParams.district_id ," for 1 week from - ",$flow.queryParams.date)
input.message: =utility.renderJSON($activity[FilterSessions].output,boolean.true())
*****No Vaccines Available on a given date*****
*****No Vaccines Available on a given date*****

input.message: =string.concat("Vaccine Availability for ",$property["min_age"], "+ Dose ",$property["dose"]," for 1 week from ",utility.renderJSON($activity[FilterCentreOnDose1Sessions].output,boolean.false()))
******** No Vaccine Available on this date *****
******** No Vaccine Available on this date *****
=string.concat("Vaccine Availability for ",$property["min_age"], "+ Dose ",$property["dose"]," for 1 week from ",utility.renderJSON($activity[FilterCentreOnDose2Sessions].output,boolean.false()))

data.name: SubFlowToSendEmailAndSMS
data.description: SubFlow To Send Email And SMS if vaccine is available

input.message: =string.concat("Vaccine Availability for ",$property["min_age"], "+ Dose ",$property["dose"]," for 1 week from ",utility.renderJSON($flow.input1,boolean.false()))
=coerce.toString($activity[GetAvailPINCodes])

input.subject: =string.concat("Vaccine Availability for " + $flow.minAgeLimit +"+ Dose "+ $flow.dose+" for 1 week from - ",$flow.dateDDMMYYYY)
input.message: =utility.renderJSON($flow.input1,boolean.true())

twilioConnection.name: twilio-connector
twilioConnection.title: Twilio Connector
twilioConnection.description: Twilio Connector to connect to the Twilio Instance

display.name: Test Credentials
display.description: Set to false if using live credentials
Timeout for HTTP Requests in Milliseconds. (Timeout=0, is indefinite)
display.name: Timeout

settings.name: DocsMetadata

display.description: Twilio Connector to connect to the Twilio Instance

body.Body: =string.concat("PIN Numbers for Vaccine Availability for ",$flow.minAgeLimit, "+ Dose ",$flow.dose," for 1 week from " + $flow.dateDDMMYYYY,coerce.toString($activity[GetAvailPINCodes]))

input.message: =string.concat($error[SendTwilioMessage].activity," ",$error[SendTwilioMessage].message, " ",$error[SendTwilioMessage].data)
=utility.renderJSON($error.SendMail,boolean.false())
=string.concat($error.activity, " ", $error.message," ",$error.data)
